Summary: Flashing lights, jerky & wobbly movements, 5 separate light objects
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Springfield
There were no other sightings in Springfield on or around October 1st 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsStarting Sept. 26th, I saw this flashing object in the NE of my house. My Dad also saw it. I watch the sky all the time and have never seen anything like this. At first I thought it was an airplane since there are lots of planes that go over my house. It wasn't there Sat. the 27th, but was back the 28th and has been there every night since. It appears to wobble, to move quickly to the right and left, up and down. Sept. 29th, I was watching it and it suddenly flashed off, like someone had turned off a switch! Tonight, Oct. 1st, I went out to look (it shows up around 9:30pm every night) and there were 5 of them! The objects seems to flash white, red and green lights. I was curious about the object, not shocked because I am sure there are other beings around the planet.
